description:
There`s no man on Earth who doesn`t like panties! (Wise saying) - Of course Umio loves panties, too! (Let`s make it clear.) Sensei tells him bashfully "Do you want to see them?" 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haru ni Panchira / I Am Rain / Zawameki
Le printemps des plans-culottes / Je suis la pluie / Se démener
Panties in the Spring / I Am Rain / Rustling
春にパンチラ / I am Rain / ざわめき
봄이 되면 팬티를 살짝 / I am Rain / 술렁술렁
